title: New: Wolf Alice – Freazy
body:
With their fantastic debut album released next week, **Wolf Alice** have gradually been teasing tracks from My Love Is Cool (alongside a [full stream](www.

npr.org/2015/06/14/412947413/first-listen-wolf-alice-my-love-is-cool) if that’s your bag). Freazy, one of the album’s standout tracks, showcases a truly unique side to the group, it’s anthemic, pop-tinged yet somehow utterly unlike anything else they’ve done before. Check it out below and pre-order the LP [here](http://po.st/MLICvinyl). Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.

Freazy, one of the album’s standout tracks, showcases a truly unique side to the group, it’s anthemic, pop-tinged yet somehow utterly unlike anything else they’ve done before. \[…\]
